reviews.review_msg: Kelleen is a very intelligent and attractive woman. It is clear she is very busy but finds the extra time to help you succeed in class.

An awesome prof! I would recommend this prof to anyone who wants to learn about teaching French. EDUC 480 is a great course for STs who are scared of teaching Core French. Made a safe environment for learning. Gave a LOT of PRACTICAL and very useful resources for the practicum! Best methodology course for PDP coursework.
